thiefworld.agents.misc

Class SimulationParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • thiefworld.agents.misc.SimulationParameters

  • public class SimulationParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the parameters controlling the simulation.
    Author:
    Stefan Adrian Boronea

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static double actionRange
      The maximum range within which the agent can perform actions.
      private static double agentRange
      The maximum range within which the agent can observe.
      private static double defaultMaxCarriedFood
      The maximum quantity of food which an agent can carry by default.
      private static double maxStepSize
      The maximum allowed movement step size for an agent.
      private static double randomMovementFactor
      Determines how random are the movements of the agent.
      private static double skillDecayRate
      Determines decay of skill level per timestep *it's not really a rate though...*
      private static double skillIncreaseRate
      Determines increase of skill level per dropOffFood action *it's not really a rate though...*
      private static double switchProbability
      The probability of an agent to switch roles (if it doesn't find food).
